original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3291)@</color>蓄力後重擊地面，以大範圍衝擊，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3291)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3291)@</color> After accumulating the force, hit the ground hard and hit the ground in a wide range to <color=#ccffcc> $Skill_Str(3291)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage to the enemy.
